task.title: Adding text to GIF in Adobe Photoshop CC
task.shortdesc: Being a bit more familiar with Photoshop gives you the ability to be more creative. You can format and add text to an animated GIF.

step.cmd: Select the layer(s) you want text to appear in in Timeline and in Layer view
Select Text Box from tool bar to click and drag over where you want the text to be located on the video layer
You have added text to your GIF
